info.name: Square Enix Forums - Deus Ex
info.description: A theme for the Square Enix forums in a style for Deus Ex: Human Revolution and Deus Ex: Mankind Divided
info.additionalInfo:
Wallpaper options were just some Deus Ex: Human Revolution themed wallpapers I found online.

Note: this theme does use some advanced CSS tricks that may not yet be working in your browser.  This has only been tested so far in Firefox Nightly builds.

options.label: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided
options.value: background: url("http://cdn4.dualshockers.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/DXMD-still-logo.png?eaa32f") no-repeat center center #000 !important; background-size: cover !important;

options.label: Deus Ex Universe
options.value: background: url("https://fbcdn-sphotos-e-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-xap1/t31.0-8/10830523_959016684127947_6316490421646053908_o.jpg") no-repeat center center #000 !important; background-size: cover !important;
